attributes.action: take action on sexism in the workplace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although women are legally equal to men, in actuality they still face predjudice in the workplace and socially. Each year around 30,000 working women are sacked and forced to leave their jobs due to pregnancy discrimination. The PM should make it easier for women to bring these sort of cases to courts/tribunals and comission an independant body for womens rights instead of just a minister for women!
